title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions for VTEB Stock

content.text: VTEB (Vanguard Tax-Exempt Bond ETF) begins trading on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE).
VTEB declares a 2-for-1 stock split, resulting in twice the number of outstanding shares. The stock split is effective on October 12, 2018.
The 2-for-1 stock split becomes effective, doubling the number of outstanding shares for VTEB stock.
VTEB undergoes a 3-for-1 reverse split, reducing the number of outstanding shares. The reverse split is effective on March 24, 2020.
The 3-for-1 reverse split becomes effective, consolidating the outstanding shares of VTEB stock.
